function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Fast spread of COVID-19 leading to a global pandemic","Impact":"High rates of infection, illness, and death","Mitigation":"Implementing strict public health measures, vaccination campaigns, and travel restrictions","Technologies":"Vaccines, contact tracing apps, and testing kits","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, and vulnerable individuals","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations, and international health agencies"},{"Description":"Ineffective collaborative practice in the Malaysian mental health system","Impact":"Failure to form therapeutic alliances with patients and lack of collaboration among healthcare staff","Mitigation":"Implementing collaborative practice training and promoting a culture of teamwork and shared decision making","Technologies":"Training programs, teamwork tools, and communication platforms","People":"Healthcare providers, patients, and mental health professionals","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, mental health institutions, and research institutions"}]}
